mapper.insert: insert into item(itemNum, itemName, itemMainType, itemSubType, itemPrice, itemDiscount, itemContent, itemImage1, itemImage2, itemImage3, itemImage4, detailImage, itemHitcount,itemStock, itemState, todaydeal, itemColor, itemSize) values (#{itemNum}, #{itemName}, #{itemMainType}, #{itemSubType}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemDiscount}, #{itemContent}, #{itemImage1}, #{itemImage2}, #{itemImage3}, #{itemImage4}, #{detailImage}, 0,#{itemStock}, #{itemState}, #{todaydeal}, #{itemColor}, #{itemSize})
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from item where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
mapper.update: update item set itemHitcount=itemHitcount+1 where itemNum=#{itemNum}
